price: 71. Ô gens du Livre ! Pourquoi affublez-vous le vrai par le faux et taisez-vous la vérité tout en la sachant ?
arabic: يَٰٓأَهۡلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لِمَ تَلۡبِسُونَ ٱلۡحَقَّ بِٱلۡبَٰطِلِ وَتَكۡتُمُونَ ٱلۡحَقَّ وَأَنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: yāahla al-kitābi lima talbisūna al-ḥaqa bil-bāṭili wataktumūna al-ḥaqa wa-antum taʿlamūna
